```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data(rest_inspec)

set.seed(3)

rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>%
    filter(boro == "MANHATTAN") %>%
  sample_n(5000) %>% view

```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Score & Inspection Date

```{r}
rest_inspec %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~inspection_date, y = ~score, 
          type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
          alpha = 0.5)
```

### Grades in Manhattan Restaurants

```{r}
rest_inspec %>%
  filter(!is.na(grade)) %>%
  count(grade) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~grade, y = ~n, type = "bar")
```
